body_html: @bhack @pawarrick I suspect if it has something to do with the input fn you are using in Estimator? (I'm not very familiar with tf.Dataset but I imagine it could need to allocate extra large amount of memory for the map function you're using (as well as the shuffling).

body: @bhack @pawarrick I suspect if it has something to do with the input fn you are using in Estimator? (I'm not very familiar with tf.Dataset but I imagine it could need to allocate extra large amount of memory for the map function you're using (as well as the shuffling).
